body.name: Foaming Face Wash - Peppermint Tea Tree Foaming Cleanser Made with Hydrating Ingredients, Acne Face Wash for Women & Men, Natural Face Wash For Oily Skin

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Beauty by Earth Store

features: Non-Drying Foaming Face Wash: Gentle ingredients in a base of aloe vera leaf juice hydrate your skin as it cleanses. No more breakouts from over drying your skin. This foam removes the dirt and oils from your face leaving you with a nice clean and clear complexion.

Sensitive? Dry? Oily? Combination?: Our all natural cleansing face wash is made without harsh ingredients but can still give you ultra clean skin. Calming for all types of complexions, even acne prone skin.

We Give You A Satisfaction Guarantee: You don’t have to wonder if you are risking your hard-earned money. If you don’t love it just let us know. We take great pride in taking care of our awesome customers. Don’t take our word for it just look at our reviews.
Use Daily Without Worry: Remove makeup, dirt, oil buildup every night to limit breakouts. Our neutral scent works for men or women.

No Chemicals Or Toxic Stuff: Our foaming face cleanser is made from organic and natural ingredients including plant based soaps that don't harm your skin as they cleanse. Just a nice light cleanse with some organic extracts for added anti aging benefits that will provide a top facial experience.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #38,658 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #551 in Facial Cleansing Washes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best face wash EVER
reviews.reviewText: I have gone through so many face washes to find one that actually leaves my face feeling clean. This stuff is it. It's amazing and will be using it for the rest of my life. Plus it even smells great.Note: It does have a strong tea tree smell so if you don't like the smell of tea tree you probably won't like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderfully gentle and pleasant face wash. And it's natural!
reviews.reviewText: It's crazy to look at the ingredients of most face washes. All the major brands use many synthetic chemicals. We love that this is an all natural product. We recently made a second purchase of 2 bottles because we like the product so well. On top of being natural, it works well. We both have sensitive skin and this does not dry our skin out like many face washes do. It still prevents oily skin and seems to clean well. We also like the scent. It's a pleasant scent that is fairly subtle and not overwhelming. The one and only negative is the pump on the bottle can be iffy. Out of 4 bottles purchased, 2 worked very well and 2 pumped out face wash, bit didn't foam like they're meant to. If they fix the QC issues with the pump, then this product would be a full five stars. As is, I'd give 4.5 stars of I could.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Updated review from 3 to 4 stars
reviews.reviewText: It’s alright. I don’t particularly like the scent which is musty and somewhat unpleasant but not completely intolerable. I do like the very slight tingle left behind but I do not like the texture of my skin after rinsing. Leaves behind a weird residue that makes the skin feel over washed and dry. Does not feel clean at all. I do not recommend.11/03/2019 Edit: After having used this anyway (I bought it, why not) it's not as bad as I originally thought. Will I buy it again? Sure, at a lower price. As I said before, I do like the slight tingle left behind; it's a nice fresh feeling. As for texture after-feel, I'm getting used to it. It's possible the far more expensive cleansers I usually use have a more luxurious feeling whereas this one does not. That said, it's actually not terrible once you get used to it. Now that I've used it for a couple of weeks I still find the scent odd but it hasn't broken me out or caused any ill effect to my skin. I've changed my mind and now I recommend - provided were less expensive. The price has gone up from when I purchased it and I would not repurchase even at the original price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works, but it doesn't? Please read~ EDIT 04-29-2020
reviews.reviewText: So, like most people here, I saw a lot of good but also bad reviews and was hesitant to buy because I was scared it might turn out to be just as bad as some people put it, and I wasn't really wanting to throw my money away, but then again, I was running out of cleanser so I decided to give it a try.Before I review the product, I must say my skin is normal type, if I use make-up, maybe oily and I don't really suffer from acne unless I'm running a temperature or I'm on my period. So the reason I bought this product was because I started breaking out a little bit because of eating habits and hot weather oils.MY FIRST RESULT: The product although does CLEAN your face, it isn't really effective with acne, at least not with my skin, it made me breakout and the first few tries it really burned. My initial plan was to use this product after a long day of work since the foam and ingredients seemed pretty comforting, but no, it really just didn't feel good at all.[EDIT 04-29-2020]I'm probably changing my whole review here, but after a few months/weeks of daily use, the product gets USED to your skin and starts working, after cleaning off make-up or excess oils with make-up removers, THEN washing your face with this, I've noticed very good results, it leaves my face clean and smooth and with no break-outs!! I still have my cream cleanser but honestly I'm so satisfied with this foam one that I haven't even touched my other one since. I guess you just need to let it get used to your skin! Took about one month or two (would've been quicker if I used it daily.)SCENT: It really isn't *bad*, it just smells like citrus, and raw sunflower seeds. It's not a pleasant smell (which is good, I don't trust scented stuff for my face), and it doesn't bother me at least, it just smells like the actual ingredients.OVERALL: This foam needs some time and daily use (after proper oil/make-up removal of course) to set to your type of skin and do it's thing! Yet like I said before, though it does clean your skin, it doesn't help with acne that you already have, it works to prevent it tho! And it will probably sting the first uses. But if you want to get rid of extra oil and dirt, it's pretty good, just make sure to moisturize right after!~

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not to harsh
reviews.reviewText: This is a gentle foaming cleanser and it’s the only one I’ve found, and trust me I’ve tried a lot, that doesn’t irritate my face and cause more acne break outs. Yet, it’s still effective and keeps things feeling fresh. Doesn’t dry out your face either.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Wanted to like it
reviews.reviewText: Dries out my skin. Used a few weeks. Switched to another product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Tiene olor agradable, le cae bien a mi piel se siente suave, no agresivo y sus ingredientes son de calidad

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Product, Even Better Customer Service!!
reviews.reviewText: This was my second shipment of foaming face wash from Beauty by Earth. The first time, shipment was timely, price was great. I LOVED the product. It has a soft vanilla scent, & leaves my face feeling moisturized and soft. I also love that it's organic.My second shipment was never confirmed, so the day it was set to arrive, I contacted Beauty through Amazon. They replied back immediately, apologizing for the mishap. They shipped my order that day via priority shipping and gave me a $5.00 credit. This would have been enough for me, but when I opened the package, there was a handwritten thank you note, apologizing again for the inconvenience, along with a few uplifting stickers and wooden coasters.Truly an A+ product & even better Customer Service. A+++ review!!

I have bought this cleanser several times now. The cleanser I used before would turn my skin red. This is nice and gentle, and I love it is natural. Will continue using this product as it has proved to be a winner! Pleasant subtle scent too! Bottle lasts quite a long time too!

Reading the label:This facewash is a foaming wash. There is nothing in the ingredients list that shouldn't be. Almost every ingredient is certified organic which is so lovely to see.The experience:It was super easy to put on and rub around. There wasn't an overpowering smell but it did have a pleasant and citrus type smell. I did not get any lavender smell from it, but there was something more than just citrus, I just can't put my finger on it. It washed off super easy as is expected from a foam face wash. My face felt a little tight afterwards, but nothing my usual moisturizer couldn't take care of. Touching my face once fully dry, it is soft, and feeling super smooth. It looks great and there is a fresh feeling like there is absolutely no dirt, or residual product left on my face.Favorite thing about this product: natural ingredients that are easy to read and understand why they are in the face wash.One thing to improve: The Amazon title for this listing states that this is for dry skin. The label itself says for all skin types. After trying the product myself, I would agree with the package label and say for all skin types/combination skin. This is very minor and can be easily fixed. The product itself is wonderful and I will be purchasing it again once this one runs out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 2, 2018
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product for my oily skin. It leaves it feeling soft & fresh. Smells great and very pleasant to use.
You can feel it working, smells nice. Feels very clean!

It came very quickly, much faster than expected and it smells very nice. It’s very soft on the skin and only takes one pump to have your whole face covered which means it’ll last a lot longer than other products. It is very gentle and I have extremely dry and irritable skin and it does make my skin feel very light and fresh however I do still moisturize after I wash it off because I know my skin and it would just become extremely dry and cracked but I’m very pleased with it. Feels very natural and I would buy again if I needed a face wash.
